title: ProfessorMesser
author: ProfessorMesser
content: Hello Everyone,I know what you all are thinking, who is this new guy without any vouches or sales doing on the marketplace, but everyone has to start somewhere.Shop link: https://ash2050.sellix.io/ As a new seller, I have do not have big sales but all of the sellers out there started where I am starting: FROM ZERO!Contact me now on Discord or Telegram to get further details and prices.Discord: ash2050#114Telegram: https://t.me/ASHafeez2050Now before I get into the list of services, I sell I would like you to read just 1 point that I think differentiates me from other sellers:I will provide UNLIMITED REPLACEMENTS within the warranty period! Now to make sure I will be able to provide replacements I have put a self-limit to the duration of warranty I will provide to a maximum of 5 months. The reason for this cap is so that my customers can trust me while purchasing that I will be online after 5 months. Unlike the market, I cannot promise 3yr warranty period because it is impossible for me to know what the condition of my shop will be after 3 yrs. Several things can happen within this time, my shop can get closed, the service you purchased can become uncrackable, I can run out of stock, and I don`t my customers to lose money, so I believe 5 months is the most reasonable time for a product of this nature.Now I will provide the list of services: Streaming, Adult, StudySTREAMINGNetflix ~ Starting From: $3The most popular service out there, isn`t it?   As the list is long, I will write just one reason why my Netflix account differs from every other out there. For every seller`s listing you will find that one thing which will violate the warranty is "logging in from multiple device" or "one device per account". There could be 2 reasons for writing this statement: First one is actually TRUE. If you login to more than one device, chances of the account being banned will be higher. But the second reason is quite FALSE. This statement is usually written so the account can be sold to multiple customers. Now with my account all I say is this, "It is HIGHLY UNRECOMMENDED/RISKY to login on multiple devices". But that's it! Doing so will NOT void your warranty.Disney Plus ~ Starting From: $1.5HULU ~ Starting From: $2.5HBO ~ Starting From: $2Crunchyroll ~ Starting From: $2HBO ~ Starting From: $2ShowTime ~ Starting From: $2Paramount+ ~ Starting From: $2History Vault ~ Starting From: $2AMC Plus ~ Starting From: $2iTV Premium ~ Starting From: $2NHL TV ~ Starting From: $2PureFlix ~ Starting From: $2Zee5 ~ Starting From: $2UFC Fight Pass ~ Starting From: $2ALTBalaji ~ Starting From: $2Every Other streaming service out there I don`t want to bore you! JUST ASK, All starting from: $2I have not listed all services on Sellix. The sellix is basically for payments via crypto. If you want to make payment via crypto just message me on Discord or Telegram.ADULTThe prices of adult accounts changes often but the starting price for every account won`t be higher that $3. Here are some of the many website`s memberships I sell.Pornhub, Fakehub, Babes, Twistys, FamilySecretXXX, Propertysex, MomsTeachSex, Nubiles-Porn, Hentaipros, HdpornMassage, PrivateSexTapes, LifetimeBoobies, Gfleaks, 18Pussyclub, RealitykingsI have 70+ adult websites so don`t worry and click here and ask.STUDYAll Study websites starting from $2Scribd, Grammerly, Masterclass, Shawacademy, Readly, Textbook, Lingvist, BookRags, Duolingo, Vooks, Lumosity, Cymaths Pro, Codecademy, SymboLab, Mondly!!!!!!!GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS!!!!!!!Read these carefully. When you purchase it is assumed you agree to to all of them.NO refunds after sale!The prices of the services may change at any given time! Final price will be quoted during the chat!If the service is not available in your country you must use a good quality VPN which will NOT be included in the service i sell unless you buy it separately.In the very unfortunate case, I may not be able honor the unlimited replacement policy, your money spent will be converted into credit which can be used to buy other products. The warranty period will remain the same as the originally purchased product.!!!!!!!WARRANTY TERMS AND CONDITIONS!!!!!!!The following terms and conditions apply to all the services I sell.Don`t change any details of the account! Email, Password, Profile Name or PictureDon`t share or resell the account!Don`t create new profile. Use any of the existing profiles by default or the one I specify.Don`t login/log out frequently!Breaking any of the above mentioned terms will INSTANTLY void your warranty. I constantly monitor sold accounts so I will know if you try to break the rules.For some services their are specific T&C which will be told before the sale during the chat!!!!!!!!PAYMENT METHODS ACCEPTED!!!!!!!I accept Crypto and Paypal as payment methods.!!!!!!!HOW TO CONTACT!!!!!!!Shop link: https://ash2050.sellix.io/ Contact me now on Discord or Telegram 24/7.Discord: ash2050#114Telegram: https://t.me/ASHafeez2050Finally I hope you will support me to grow this business significantly. I thank you, my dear readers if you read all my story and reached here.[/list][/list]
